entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Amqui
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
